text.text: By accessing this website you accept these Terms and Conditions and agree to be bound by same and you are deemed to have read, understood, and agreed to these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions do not apply to external links to third party sites; in the event you access a third party website from the Website, you should consult that site’s terms and conditions of use.

The use of the Website, including the Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the laws of the Province of British Columbia and the laws of Canada as applicable therein. You agree to attorn to the jurisdiction of the courts of the Province of British Columbia.
